login.A safe place to store your passwords: A safe place to store your passwords

userSignup.We need to define a master password for: We need to define a master password for your user.
userSignup.This will be the only password you'll ha: This will be the only password you'll have to remember from now on, and it will maintain all your other passwords encrypted and secured.
userSignup.Please, choose a password and save it sa: Please, choose a password and save it safely. Note that if you forget it, Passager administrators won't be able to recover your account and you'll lose all your information.
userSignup.Tips for choosing a safe master password: Tips for choosing a safe master password:
userSignup.Use a password longer than 8 characters: Use a password longer than 8 characters.
userSignup.Use a password that contains at least on: Use a password that contains at least one capital letter, one number and one special character.
userSignup.Avoid using the same password on other s: Avoid using the same password on other services or accounts.
